room_title: Escape room "Nosferatu" by Escape The Netherworld in Atlanta
room_address: 2076 West Park Place Blvd Stone Mountain, GA 30087
room_description:
Travel back in time to the 1900s. The scene is set in London, England, and your group is hired by a cloaked and hooded figure known only as Van Helsing. Your mission is to enter an abandoned basement in a secluded part of the town and wait there for further instructions.
Armed with candles, you descend to the cellar exactly one hour before night falls. Van Helsing is nowhere to be seen, but you notice a word carved into the door - Nosferatu... Can you find the creature's hidden tomb before it awakes?
